column5: If any of you have used this outfitter in past years. You might have met a river pilot by the name of Eugene Bretin, lived in Hudson. Was a very decent chap. I post because I was notified by his daughter in law he has passed. Heart attack on Friday am. Andrea at Floating lodges said if you email her a condolence, she will forward them to Eugenes family at funeral Thursday. Blessings on a good man.
